word_mean: 牛皮癣，银屑病：一种反复发作的、丘疹鳞屑性慢性遗传性皮肤病。其特有的损害为鲜红色斑疹、丘疹或斑块，几乎到病损边缘都由银白色层状鳞屑覆盖。通常侵犯头皮、肢体伸面，尤其是肘部、膝部及胫部皮肤
皮损状如松皮，形如疹疥，搔起白皮的红癍鳞屑性皮肤病。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek psōriasis, from psōrian 'have an itch', from psōra 'itch'

entry.def: Psoriasis is a disease that causes dry red patches on the skin.

means.word_mean: 1. a chronic skin disease characterized by dry red patches covered with scales; occurs especially on the scalp and ears and genitalia and the skin over bony prominences

auth_sentence.content: Psoriasis occurs when new skin cells are made too quickly.
